To preserve existing markup, retrieve the current page first using Get, modify as needed, then submit the complete updated object. Requires appropriate authentication and authorization.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description mentions full update behavior but lacks clarity about output (returns updated ClaimReviewMarkupPage), input requirements (complete object needed), and the workflow implications. Reorganized for better clarity and AI agent understanding of the full-replacement semantics.
